title: Horror Game Conquering
detail_text: <:th_ch0202/>Rinako, Rinako~! Kasumi is in a tight pinch right now~!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0209/>What’s wrong, Kasumi-chan?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0202/>Kasumin’s senpai are all playing this one game, and Kasumi wants to play too, but......<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0209/>Ah, you mean that horror FPS game?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0202/>Yeah, that one! It’s so scary. Kasumin can’t handle it! What should Kasumin do!?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0209/>If you’re too scared, then you shouldn’t......<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0202/>But, Kasumin wants to play the same game as her senpai......<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0209/>Then, what if you play the game without seeing any of the scary parts?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0202/>There’s a way to do that!? Teach Kasumin!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0209/>When the monsters come to attack you, just take them down. Rina-chan Board says, “Determined.”<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0202/>Huh?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0209/>If you remember the places and the timings where the monsters come out, then you’ll be able to take them down and finish the game without seeing the scary parts.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0202/>Hold on. Remembering the levels would mean that Kasumin would have to see the scary parts!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0209/>......Good luck. Here, go practice now.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0202/>Noooooo~!!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
